root.name: Karaoke Revolution Volume 3
root.description: Soundtrack"ABC" by the Jackson 5"Against All Odds (Take a Look at Me Now)" by Phil Collins"Ain't No Mountain High Enough" by Marvin Gaye and Tammi Terrell"Beat It" by Michael Jackson"Burn" by Usher"California Dreamin'" by the Mamas the Papas"Careless Whisper" by George Michael"Come Clean" by Hilary Duff"Don't You (Forget About Me)" by Simple Minds"Flashdance... What a Feeling" by Irene Cara"Hold On" by Good Charlotte"I Got You Babe" by Sonny Cher"If I Ain't Got You" by Alicia Keys"Joy to the World" by Three Dog Night"Killing Me Softly" by the Fugees"Leave (Get Out)" by Jojo"Love Shack" by the B-52s"Meant to Live" by Switchfoot"My Immortal" by Evanescence"New York, New York" by Frank Sinatra"Oops!... I Did It Again" by Britney Spears"Respect" by Aretha Franklin"Shining Star" by Earth, Wind Fire"Someday" by Nickelback"Take My Breath Away" by Berlin"Thank You" by Dido"The Reason" by Hoobastank"Twist and Shout" by the Isley Brothers"Unchained Melody" by the Righteous Brothers"Under Pressure" by Queen David Bowie"Waiting For You" by Akira Yamaoka Mary Elizabeth McGlynn"When I'm Gone" by 3 Doors Down"Why Can't I" by Liz Phair"You're the One That I Want" by Olivia Newton-John John Travolta"China Grove" by the Doobie Brothers (Secret Song)"In the Midnight Hour" by Wilson Pickett (Secret Song)"Snake Eater" by Norihiko Hibino Cynthia Harrell (Secret Song)
